name: Project: Dreamshot
description:
Travel into the bazaar world of the Scape Zones as a shy, snow boy Fuyu; the fiery, cute but crazy Lacey; and the stern, deadpanned, water ninja Ashlyn; in this top-down-shooter adventure full of dreams and nightmares. Travel through 6 levels to rescue a Scape Zone Host infected by a Nightmare Virus.

This game is a prototype so everything seen is subject to change and placeholders. This is to prove a concept. A new game created by me, focusing on top-down-shooter styled combat and puzzle solving. Not everything is featured in the game, such as dialogue boxes, the "Overworld", and more characters and concepts. They will be added if the game gets enough attention.

This prototype also features a Score Display and Speedrun Clock so try to earn the highest score and/or beat the prototype as fast as you can!

Game Version: 0.1.1 (October 21th 2022 Build)
